verbs.description: suny school reviews [V: hiring] practices in wake of officials wild claims a state medical university in syracuse did not fully research the background of a former chief of staff who resigned earlier this week after a times union story raised questions about his apparent fabrications in his professional background a member of the school faculty said the university president danielle laraque - arena recently acknowledged that not all of the past employers of the former chief of staff and senior vice president sergio a garcia had been contacted prior to his hiring last year state university of new york sergio a garcia
